snippet: Former President George W. Bush is set to take a stage in South Carolina on Monday with his brother, in an appearance that offers a glimpse into the complicated dynamics of a family dynasty.
abstract: Former Pres George W Bush will appear beside his brother Jeb at 2016 presidential campaign rally in North Charleston, SC; move is intended to use South Carolina's primary to re-energize Bush's stalled campaign, given history of support South Carolina voters have showed Bush family in past elections.
lead_paragraph: Former President George W. Bush is set to take a stage in South Carolina on Monday with his brother, in an appearance that offers a glimpse into the complicated dynamics of a family dynasty.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Adds a Weapon (His Brother) Despite Worries It Could Misfire
headline.print_headline: Bush Adding a Weapon (His Brother) Despite Worries It Could Misfire
